verses.verse: Now it came <S%H1961><s%> about in the seventh <S%H7637><s%> year, <S%H8141><s%> in the fifth <S%H2549><s%> [month, <S%H2320><s%>] on the tenth <S%H6218><s%> of the month, that certain <S%H376><s%> of the elders <S%H2205><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> came <S%H935><s%> to inquire <S%H1875><s%> of the Lord, <S%H3068><s%> and sat <S%H3427><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> me.
And the word <S%H1697><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> came <S%H1961><s%> to me saying, <S%H559><s%>

"Son <S%H1121><s%> of man, <S%H120><s%> speak <S%H1696><s%> to the elders <S%H2205><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> and say <S%H559><s%> to them, 'Thus <S%H3541><s%> says <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> God, <S%H3068><s%> "Do you come <S%H935><s%> to inquire <S%H1875><s%> of Me? As I live, <S%H2416><s%>" declares <S%H5002><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> God, <S%H3068><s%> "I will not be inquired <S%H1875><s%> of by you. "'
"Will you judge <S%H8199><s%> them, will you judge <S%H8199><s%> them, son <S%H1121><s%> of man <S%H120><s%>? Make them know <S%H3045><s%> the abominations <S%H8441><s%> of their fathers;

and say <S%H559><s%> to them, 'Thus <S%H3541><s%> says <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> God, <S%H3068><s%> "On the day <S%H3117><s%> when I chose <S%H977><s%> Israel <S%H3478><s%> and swore <S%H5375><s%> <S%H3027><s%> to the descendants <S%H2233><s%> of the house <S%H1004><s%> of Jacob <S%H3290><s%> and made <S%H3045><s%> Myself known <S%H3045><s%> to them in the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt, <S%H4714><s%> when I swore <S%H5375><s%> <S%H3027><s%> to them, saying, <S%H559><s%> I am the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God, <S%H430><s%>

on that day <S%H3117><s%> I swore <S%H5375><s%> <S%H3027><s%> to them, to bring <S%H3318><s%> them out from the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%> into a land <S%H776><s%> that I had selected <S%H8446><s%> for them, flowing <S%H2100><s%> with milk <S%H2461><s%> and honey, <S%H1706><s%> which <S%H1931><s%> is the glory <S%H9469><s%> of all <S%H3605><s%> lands. <S%H776><s%>

"And I said <S%H559><s%> to them, 'Cast <S%H7993><s%> away, <S%H7993><s%> each <S%H376><s%> of you, the detestable <S%H8251><s%> things <S%H8251><s%> of his eyes, <S%H5869><s%> and do not defile <S%H2930><s%> yourselves with the idols <S%H1544><s%> of Egypt; <S%H4714><s%> I am the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God. <S%H430><s%>'

"But they rebelled <S%H4784><s%> against Me and were not willing <S%H14><s%> to listen <S%H8085><s%> to Me; they did not cast <S%H7993><s%> away <S%H7993><s%> the detestable <S%H8251><s%> things <S%H8251><s%> of their eyes, <S%H5869><s%> nor <S%H3808><s%> did they forsake <S%H5800><s%> the idols <S%H1544><s%> of Egypt. <S%H4714><s%> Then I resolved <S%H559><s%> to pour <S%H8210><s%> out My wrath <S%H2534><s%> on them, to accomplish <S%H3615><s%> My anger <S%H639><s%> against them in the midst <S%H8432><s%> of the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt. <S%H4714><s%>

"But I acted <S%H6213><s%> for the sake <S%H4616><s%> of My name, <S%H8034><s%> that it should not be profaned <S%H2490><s%> in the sight <S%H5869><s%> of the nations <S%H1471><s%> among <S%H8432><s%> whom <S%H834><s%> they [lived,] in whose <S%H834><s%> sight <S%H5869><s%> I made <S%H3045><s%> Myself known <S%H3045><s%> to them by bringing <S%H3318><s%> them out of the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt. <S%H4714><s%>
"So I took <S%H3318><s%> them out of the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%> and brought <S%H935><s%> them into the wilderness. <S%H4057><s%>

"And I gave <S%H5414><s%> them My statutes <S%H2708><s%> and informed <S%H3045><s%> them of My ordinances, <S%H4941><s%> by which, <S%H834><s%> if a man <S%H120><s%> observes <S%H6213><s%> them, he will live. <S%H2421><s%>

"And also <S%H1571><s%> I gave <S%H5414><s%> them My sabbaths <S%H7676><s%> to be a sign <S%H226><s%> between <S%H996><s%> Me and them, that they might know <S%H3045><s%> that I am the Lord <S%H3068><s%> who sanctifies <S%H6942><s%> them.

"But the house <S%H1004><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> rebelled <S%H4784><s%> against Me in the wilderness. <S%H4057><s%> They did not walk <S%H1980><s%> in My statutes, <S%H2708><s%> and they rejected <S%H3988><s%> My ordinances, <S%H4941><s%> by which, <S%H834><s%> if a man <S%H120><s%> observes <S%H6213><s%> them, he will live; <S%H2421><s%> and My sabbaths <S%H7676><s%> they greatly <S%H3966><s%> profaned. <S%H2490><s%> Then I resolved <S%H559><s%> to pour <S%H8210><s%> out My wrath <S%H2534><s%> on them in the wilderness, <S%H4057><s%> to annihilate <S%H3615><s%> them.

"But I acted <S%H6213><s%> for the sake <S%H4616><s%> of My name, <S%H8034><s%> that it should not be profaned <S%H2490><s%> in the sight <S%H5869><s%> of the nations, <S%H1471><s%> before whose <S%H834><s%> sight <S%H5869><s%> I had brought <S%H3318><s%> them out.

"And also <S%H1571><s%> I swore <S%H5375><s%> <S%H3027><s%> to them in the wilderness <S%H4057><s%> that I would not bring <S%H935><s%> them into the land <S%H776><s%> which <S%H834><s%> I had given <S%H5414><s%> them, flowing <S%H2100><s%> with milk <S%H2461><s%> and honey, <S%H1706><s%> which <S%H1931><s%> is the glory <S%H9469><s%> of all <S%H3605><s%> lands, <S%H776><s%>

because <S%H3282><s%> they rejected <S%H3988><s%> My ordinances, <S%H4941><s%> and as for My statutes, <S%H2708><s%> they did not walk <S%H1980><s%> in them; they even profaned <S%H2490><s%> My sabbaths, <S%H7676><s%> for their heart <S%H3820><s%> continually went <S%H1980><s%> after <S%H310><s%> their idols. <S%H1544><s%>

"Yet My eye <S%H5869><s%> spared <S%H2347><s%> them rather <S%H4480><s%> than <S%H4480><s%> destroying <S%H7843><s%> them, and I did not cause <S%H6213><s%> their annihilation <S%H3617><s%> in the wilderness. <S%H4057><s%>

"And I said <S%H559><s%> to their children <S%H1121><s%> in the wilderness, <S%H4057><s%> 'Do not walk <S%H1980><s%> in the statutes <S%H2706><s%> of your fathers, or keep <S%H1><s%> their ordinances, <S%H8104><s%> or defile <S%H4941><s%> yourselves with their idols. <S%H2930><s%>
'I am the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God; <S%H430><s%> walk <S%H1980><s%> in My statutes, <S%H2708><s%> and keep <S%H8104><s%> My ordinances, <S%H4941><s%> and observe <S%H6213><s%> them.

'And sanctify <S%H6942><s%> My sabbaths; <S%H7676><s%> and they shall be a sign <S%H226><s%> between <S%H996><s%> Me and you, that you may know <S%H3045><s%> that I am the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God. <S%H430><s%>'

"But the children <S%H1121><s%> rebelled <S%H4784><s%> against Me; they did not walk <S%H1980><s%> in My statutes, <S%H2708><s%> nor <S%H3808><s%> were they careful <S%H8104><s%> to observe <S%H6213><s%> My ordinances, <S%H4941><s%> by which, <S%H834><s%> [if] a man <S%H120><s%> observes <S%H6213><s%> them, he will live; <S%H2421><s%> they profaned <S%H2490><s%> My sabbaths. <S%H7676><s%> So I resolved <S%H559><s%> to pour <S%H8210><s%> out My wrath <S%H2534><s%> on them, to accomplish <S%H3615><s%> My anger <S%H639><s%> against them in the wilderness. <S%H4057><s%>

"But I withdrew <S%H7725><s%> My hand <S%H3027><s%> and acted <S%H6213><s%> for the sake <S%H4616><s%> of My name, <S%H8034><s%> that it should not be profaned <S%H2490><s%> in the sight <S%H5869><s%> of the nations <S%H1471><s%> in whose <S%H834><s%> sight <S%H5869><s%> I had brought <S%H3318><s%> them out.

"Also <S%H1571><s%> I swore <S%H5375><s%> <S%H3027><s%> to them in the wilderness <S%H4057><s%> that I would scatter <S%H6327><s%> them among the nations <S%H1471><s%> and disperse <S%H2219><s%> them among the lands, <S%H776><s%>

because <S%H3282><s%> they had not observed <S%H6213><s%> My ordinances, <S%H4941><s%> but had rejected <S%H3988><s%> My statutes, <S%H2708><s%> and had profaned <S%H2490><s%> My sabbaths, <S%H7676><s%> and their eyes <S%H5869><s%> were on the idols <S%H1544><s%> of their fathers.
"And I also <S%H1571><s%> gave <S%H5414><s%> them statutes <S%H2706><s%> that were not good <S%H2896><s%> and ordinances <S%H4941><s%> by which they could not live; <S%H2421><s%>

and I pronounced <S%H2930><s%> them unclean <S%H2930><s%> because of their gifts, <S%H4979><s%> in that they caused all <S%H3605><s%> their first-born to pass <S%H5674><s%> through <S%H5674><s%> [the fire] so <S%H4616><s%> that I might make <S%H8074><s%> them desolate, <S%H8074><s%> in order <S%H4616><s%> that they might know <S%H3045><s%> that I am the Lord. <S%H3068><s%> "'

"Therefore, <S%H3651><s%> son <S%H1121><s%> of man, <S%H120><s%> speak <S%H1696><s%> to the house <S%H1004><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> and say <S%H559><s%> to them, 'Thus <S%H3541><s%> says <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> God, <S%H3068><s%> "Yet <S%H5750><s%> in this <S%H2088><s%> your fathers have blasphemed <S%H1><s%> Me by acting <S%H1442><s%> treacherously <S%H4603><s%> against Me.

"When I had brought <S%H935><s%> them into the land <S%H776><s%> which <S%H834><s%> I swore <S%H5375><s%> <S%H3027><s%> to give <S%H5414><s%> to them, then they saw <S%H7200><s%> every <S%H3605><s%> high <S%H7311><s%> hill <S%H1389><s%> and every <S%H3605><s%> leafy <S%H5687><s%> tree, <S%H6086><s%> and they offered <S%H2076><s%> there <S%H8033><s%> their sacrifices, <S%H2077><s%> and there <S%H8033><s%> they presented <S%H5414><s%> the provocation <S%H3708><s%> of their offering. <S%H7133><s%> There <S%H8033><s%> also they made <S%H7760><s%> their soothing <S%H5207><s%> aroma, <S%H7381><s%> and there <S%H8033><s%> they poured <S%H5258><s%> out their libations. <S%H5262><s%>

"Then I said <S%H559><s%> to them, 'What <S%H4100><s%> is the high <S%H1116><s%> place <S%H1116><s%> to which <S%H834><s%> you go <S%H935><s%>?' So its name <S%H8034><s%> is called <S%H7121><s%> Bamah <S%H1117><s%> to this <S%H2088><s%> day. <S%H3117><s%>"'

"Therefore, <S%H3651><s%> say <S%H559><s%> to the house <S%H1004><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> 'Thus <S%H3541><s%> says <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> God, <S%H3068><s%> "Will you defile <S%H2930><s%> yourselves after the manner <S%H1870><s%> of your fathers and play <S%H1><s%> the harlot <S%H2181><s%> after <S%H2181><s%> their detestable <S%H310><s%> things <S%H8251><s%>?

"And when you offer <S%H5375><s%> your gifts, <S%H4979><s%> when you cause your sons <S%H1121><s%> to pass <S%H5674><s%> through the fire, <S%H784><s%> you are defiling <S%H2930><s%> yourselves with all <S%H3605><s%> your idols <S%H1544><s%> to this day. <S%H3117><s%> And shall I be inquired <S%H1875><s%> of by you, O house <S%H1004><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>? As I live, <S%H2416><s%> "declares <S%H5002><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> God, <S%H3068><s%> "I will not be inquired <S%H1875><s%> of by you.

"And what comes <S%H5927><s%> into your mind <S%H7307><s%> will not come <S%H1961><s%> about, when <S%H834><s%> you say: <S%H559><s%> 'We will be like the nations, <S%H1471><s%> like the tribes <S%H4940><s%> of the lands, <S%H776><s%> serving <S%H8334><s%> wood <S%H6086><s%> and stone. <S%H68><s%>'

"As I live, <S%H2416><s%>" declares <S%H5002><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> God, <S%H3068><s%> "surely <S%H518><s%> <S%H3808><s%> with a mighty <S%H2389><s%> hand <S%H3027><s%> and with an outstretched <S%H5186><s%> arm <S%H2220><s%> and with wrath <S%H2534><s%> poured <S%H8210><s%> out, I shall be king <S%H4427><s%> over <S%H5921><s%> you.

"And I shall bring <S%H3318><s%> you out from the peoples <S%H5971><s%> and gather <S%H6908><s%> you from the lands <S%H776><s%> where <S%H834><s%> you are scattered, <S%H6327><s%> with a mighty <S%H2389><s%> hand <S%H3027><s%> and with an outstretched <S%H5186><s%> arm <S%H2220><s%> and with wrath <S%H2534><s%> poured <S%H8210><s%> out;

and I shall bring <S%H935><s%> you into the wilderness <S%H4057><s%> of the peoples, <S%H5971><s%> and there <S%H8033><s%> I shall enter <S%H8199><s%> into judgment <S%H8199><s%> with you face <S%H6440><s%> to face. <S%H6440><s%>

"As I entered <S%H8199><s%> into judgment <S%H8199><s%> with your fathers in the wilderness <S%H1><s%> of the land <S%H4057><s%> of Egypt, <S%H776><s%> so <S%H4714><s%> I will enter <S%H3651><s%> into judgment <S%H8199><s%> with you," declares <S%H8199><s%> the Lord <S%H5002><s%> God. <S%H136><s%>
"And I shall make you pass <S%H5674><s%> under <S%H8478><s%> the rod, <S%H7626><s%> and I shall bring <S%H935><s%> you into the bond <S%H4562><s%> of the covenant; <S%H1285><s%>

and I shall purge <S%H1305><s%> from you the rebels <S%H4775><s%> and those who transgress <S%H6586><s%> against Me; I shall bring <S%H3318><s%> them out of the land <S%H776><s%> where <S%H4033><s%> they sojourn, <S%H4033><s%> but they will not enter <S%H935><s%> the land <S%H127><s%> of Israel. <S%H3478><s%> Thus you will know <S%H3045><s%> that I am the Lord. <S%H3068><s%>

"As for you, O house <S%H1004><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%>" thus <S%H3541><s%> says <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> God, <S%H3068><s%> "Go, <S%H1980><s%> serve <S%H5647><s%> everyone <S%H376><s%> his idols; <S%H1544><s%> but later, <S%H310><s%> you will surely <S%H518><s%> <S%H369><s%> listen <S%H8085><s%> to Me, and My holy <S%H6944><s%> name <S%H8034><s%> you will profane <S%H2490><s%> no <S%H3808><s%> longer <S%H5750><s%> with your gifts <S%H4979><s%> and with your idols. <S%H1544><s%>

"For on My holy <S%H6944><s%> mountain, <S%H2022><s%> on the high <S%H4791><s%> mountain <S%H2022><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%>" declares <S%H5002><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> God, <S%H3068><s%> "there <S%H8033><s%> the whole <S%H3605><s%> house <S%H1004><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> of them, will serve <S%H5647><s%> Me in the land; <S%H776><s%> there <S%H8033><s%> I shall accept <S%H7521><s%> them, and there <S%H8033><s%> I shall seek <S%H1875><s%> your contributions <S%H8641><s%> and the choicest <S%H7225><s%> of your gifts, <S%H4864><s%> with all <S%H3605><s%> your holy <S%H6944><s%> things. <S%H6944><s%>

"As a soothing <S%H5207><s%> aroma <S%H7381><s%> I shall accept <S%H7521><s%> you, when I bring <S%H3318><s%> you out from the peoples <S%H5971><s%> and gather <S%H6908><s%> you from the lands <S%H776><s%> where <S%H834><s%> you are scattered; <S%H6327><s%> and I shall prove <S%H6942><s%> Myself holy <S%H6942><s%> among you in the sight <S%H5869><s%> of the nations. <S%H1471><s%>

"And you will know <S%H3045><s%> that I am the Lord, <S%H3068><s%> when I bring <S%H935><s%> you into the land <S%H127><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> into the land <S%H776><s%> which <S%H834><s%> I swore <S%H5375><s%> <S%H3027><s%> to give <S%H5414><s%> to your forefathers.

"And there <S%H8033><s%> you will remember <S%H2142><s%> your ways <S%H1870><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> your deeds, <S%H5949><s%> with which <S%H834><s%> you have defiled <S%H2930><s%> yourselves; and you will loathe <S%H6962><s%> yourselves in your own sight <S%H6440><s%> for all <S%H3605><s%> the evil <S%H7451><s%> things <S%H7451><s%> that you have done. <S%H6213><s%>

"Then you will know <S%H3045><s%> that I am the Lord <S%H3068><s%> when I have dealt <S%H6213><s%> with you for My name's sake, <S%H4616><s%> not according to your evil <S%H7451><s%> ways <S%H1870><s%> or according to your corrupt <S%H7843><s%> deeds, <S%H5949><s%> O house <S%H1004><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%>" declares <S%H5002><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> God. <S%H3068><s%>' "
Now the word <S%H1697><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> came <S%H1961><s%> to me saying, <S%H559><s%>

"Son <S%H1121><s%> of man, <S%H120><s%> set <S%H7760><s%> your face <S%H6440><s%> toward <S%H1870><s%> Teman, <S%H8487><s%> and speak <S%H5197><s%> out against <S%H413><s%> the south, <S%H1864><s%> and prophesy <S%H5012><s%> against <S%H413><s%> the forest <S%H9194><s%> land <S%H7704><s%> of the Negev, <S%H5045><s%>

and say <S%H559><s%> to the forest <S%H9194><s%> of the Negev, <S%H5045><s%> 'Hear <S%H8085><s%> the word <S%H1697><s%> of the Lord: <S%H3068><s%> thus <S%H3541><s%> says <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> God, <S%H3068><s%> "Behold, <S%H2009><s%> I am about to kindle <S%H3341><s%> a fire <S%H784><s%> in you, and it shall consume <S%H398><s%> every <S%H3605><s%> green <S%H3892><s%> tree <S%H6086><s%> in you, as well as every <S%H3605><s%> dry <S%H3002><s%> tree; <S%H6086><s%> the blazing <S%H3852><s%> flame <S%H3852><s%> will not be quenched, <S%H3518><s%> and the whole <S%H3605><s%> surface <S%H6440><s%> from south <S%H5045><s%> to north <S%H6828><s%> will be burned <S%H6866><s%> by it.
"And all <S%H3605><s%> flesh <S%H1320><s%> will see <S%H7200><s%> that I, the Lord, <S%H3068><s%> have kindled <S%H1197><s%> it; it shall not be quenched. <S%H3518><s%>"' "
Then I said, <S%H559><s%> "Ah Lord <S%H136><s%> God! <S%H3068><s%> They are saying <S%H559><s%> of me, 'Is he not [just] speaking <S%H9301><s%> parables <S%H4912><s%>?'"
